description: The Fairy Tail Guild from Edolas is an alternate universe counterpart of the http://anidb.net/ch18752 [Fairy Tail] Guild from Earth Land. The Fairy Tail Guild was only magic guild in the whole Edolas realm and was treated like a Dark Guild since mage guilds are banned. It was therefore targeted by the Royal Army for destruction. Now that Mystogan sucked all the magic of Edolas to Earth Land, it doesn`t have any magic anymore.
name: Fairy Tail (Edolas)
